name: Flesch–Kincaid readability test - Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
caption: en.wikipedia.org
description: The Flesch/Flesch–Kincaid readability tests are designed to indicate comprehension difficulty when reading a passage of contemporary academic English. There are two tests, the Flesch Reading Ease, and the Flesch–Kincaid Grade Level. Although they use the same core measures (word length and sentence…
